A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Social Justice ruins yet another Star Wars movie. Absolutely ridiculous 2 dimensional characters with no depth. Tries too hard to tick all the politically correct identity boxes.. Obnoxious female leaders\, weak pathetic emotionally unstable and submissive males\, clownish white men\, token minorities. Disconnected plots. Only positive\, the effects were good so there's something.
